description:
Hop over roots and rocks, these summit-chasers are built for trail runs that cross high ridges and descend steep switchbacks. They're lightweight and flexible and offer a locked-in feel thanks to the bootie construction. Aggressive lugs, and a rock plate round out their performance nature.

  • Lightweight engineered mesh upper with abrasion-resistant detailing
  • Seamless bootie construction provides a comfortable and secure fit
  • FuelCell midsole provides responsive support and cushioning, while keeping weight low
  • Rock Stop Plate offers protection without compromising foot flex
  • TPU Toe Protect adds another level of shielding against rocks and debris
  • Hydrohesion rubber outsole with aggressive lugs for traction on loose or muddy surfaces
name: New Balance FuelCell Summit Unknown v4 Trail Running Shoes - Men's
